Eco-Friendly Coffee Maker: A coffee maker that uses recycled materials and has a built-in composting system for used coffee grounds.
Multi-Function Coffee Maker: A coffee maker that can also make tea, hot chocolate, and other hot beverages.
Voice-Activated Coffee Maker: A coffee maker that can be controlled using voice commands, allowing you to make coffee without lifting a finger.
Coffee Maker with Built-In Grinder: A coffee maker that grinds beans just before brewing, ensuring maximum freshness and flavor.
Coffee Maker with Customizable Brewing Settings: A coffee maker that allows you to adjust the strength, temperature, and brewing time to your liking.
